title: (x) Reserve Solutions - Monotype Garamond {Lex}
content:
Hello everyone,

Would you please help me identify the font usage in the logo below.  
It would be a great help, thanks.  
It is looking more like Garamond Bold to me...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [reserve.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017053403/http:/typophile.com/files/reserve.jpg) | 628.88 KB |

 [‹ (x) Neomusic - Pastiche {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017053403/http:/typophile.com/node/14014 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) World of Warcraft font - Folkard {Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017053403/http:/typophile.com/node/14023 "Go to next forum topic")
author: miu_miu

comments.content:
Your logo isn’t showing up for me. Is anyone else having the same problem?

- Lex
you need to rename your file with no capital letters or spaces between the words and then repost it.

i renamed it, but it’s still not showing up.  
were you able to save it and then open it?  
Thank you.

It’s because it’s a CMYK graphic. Re-save it as RGB.

- Lex

You’re right - it’s [Monotype Garamond Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017053403/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.221.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=RESERVE&sampleSize=48) and [Monotype Garamond Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017053403/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.221.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=SOLUTIONS&sampleSize=48)

- Lex
